attributes.action: Scrap the current Eco-panic & confusion manifesto
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's time to quash the hysteria and fables and the right time to get real with the whole "Climate change" agenda.

Stop pretending to care for this earth by continuously raising taxes whilst at the same time doing absolutely nothing with the extra cash to generate aternatives.

It takes a big man to stand up and question the funded eco-terrorist networks, let's not wait 100 days Gordon, lets do it now.

The quicker this is all brought to an end, the less embarrasing it will be for all concerned. Do you really want 60 million people asking for green tax refunds when the truth is uncovered?? Yet another big hole in the UK treasury funds.

It's time for real action against all of this hype NOW. Let's get all the huggers off the Gov't payroll and put that money into something useful...maybe invest in water based transport methods....oh no, that would bring the world economy to it's knees.

Stop penalising the motorists, instead provide a transportation network to rival the rest of the world. It's time to WAKE up.
